disciplines: DEG0200 - ATIVIDADE COMPLEMENTAR - 15h Optativa function dpf(f) {var adp = f.adp;if (adp != null) {for (var i = 0;i < adp.length;i++) {f.removeChild(adp[i]);}}};function apf(f, pvp) {var adp = new Array();f.adp = adp;var i = 0;for (k in pvp) {var p = document.createElement("input");p.type = "hidden";p.name = k;p.value = pvp[k];f.appendChild(p);adp[i++] = p;}};function jsfcljs(f, pvp, t) {apf(f, pvp);var ft = f.target;if (t) {f.target = t;}f.submit();f.target = ft;dpf(f);};
